description: A highly complex and advanced system of computation equipment and hardlight projectors which can produce a facsimile of nearly any tool imaginable, and automatically calculates the optimal way to use them based on the project.
A battery comprised of quantum crystal that allows the freezing of free electrons directly, allowing for unprecedented bionic power storage.
A set of induction plates and a small vanometric electron miner that generates energy passively from fluctuations in quantum foam.
A set of induction plates and a small vanometric electron miner that generates energy passively from fluctuations in quantum foam.
